title: 1935년 McInturf 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: McInturf. 판결일: 1935-10-16. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Bill McINTURF v. STATE
**판결일**: 1935-10-16
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Morrow

## 변호인

John E. Clarke, of Hillsboro, for appellant., Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 86 S.W.2d 1116

## 판결문 요약


MORROW, Presiding Judge.
The offense is murder; penalty assessed at confinement in the penitentiary for forty years.
Upon the written request of the appellant, duly verified by his affidavit, the appeal is dismissed.
...
